Text: Hey salvoiorfida, I already have the whole series of Chevalier D'Eon, but I can't find English Subtitles for them ANYWHERE. This is the only place I've seen that includes them but no one is seeding, and you haven't uploaded all of the episodes. Would it be possible for you to upload just the subtitles? Or send them to my email? Or if anyone is reading this could anyone at all help me get the subtitles? Thanks in advance!
